Bookmarking conferences

Pratik Bhandari

During the interactions with my colleagues in UdS and friends from other universities, I have realized that those of us who work along the same line of research are not mutually aware of the conferences weâ€™d all like to attend and probably benefit from. (It is a different topic, how beneficial conferences are.) Here I am curating a list of conferences some of which I have attended and seem worth sharing, and others Iâ€™d like to attend but have not yet.


This is nowhere near an exhaustive list; it is updated regularly.1 If it helps you, great! If not, at least I have a bookmark for myself ðŸ˜…

Program Date Abstract submission deadline Format
1 Annual (CUNY) Conference on Human Sentence Processing (35th HSP) March 24 - March 26 Dec 06, 2021 Online & Santa Cruz, US
2 Annual meeting of Cognitive Neuroscience Society (29th CNS) April 23 - April 26 Jan 11 San Francisco, US
3 Association for Psychological Sciences Annual Convention of Psychological Science (APS 2022) May 26 - May 29 Feb 07 Chicago, US
4 Meeting of the Acoustical Society of America (182nd ASA) May 23 - May 27 Jan 24 Denver, US
5 Society for the Improvement of Psychological Science (SIPS 2022) June 27 - June 29 March 21 Victoria, Canada
6 Annual conference of the Cognitive Science Society (CogSci 2022) July 26 - July 29 Feb 01 Online & Toronto, Canada
7 Interspeech Sep 18 - Sep 22 March 21 Incheon, South Korea
8 Architectures and Mechanisms for Language Processing (AMLaP 2022) Sep 07 - Sep 09 May 06 NA
9 Society for the Neurobiology of Language (SNL) Oct 06 - Oct 08 May 25 Philadelphia, US
10 Psychonomic Society 2022 Annual Meeting (Psychonomic) November 17 - November 20 June 01 Online & Boston, US
11 Neuroscience 2022 - Society for Neuroscience (SfN) Nov 12 - Nov 16 June 21 San Diego, US
12 Symposium for Cognitive Auditory Neuroscience (SCAN) throughout 2022 NA NA
13 22nd Conference of the European Society for Cognitive Psychology (ESCOP 2022) Aug 29 - Sep 01 April 01 Lille, France
14 Joint Conference on Language Evolution, 2022 Sep 05 - Sep 08 Feb 01 Online & Kanazawa, Japan
15 60th Annual Meeting of the Association for Computational Linguistics (ACL 2022) May 22 - May 27 Nov 15, 2021 Online & Dublin, Ireland
16 Federation of European Neuroscience Societies (FENS Forum 2022) July 09 - July 13 Feb 22 Paris, France
17 Salzburg Mind Brain Annual Meeting (SAMBA 2022) July 14 - July 15 April 29 Salzburg, Austria
18 International Max Planck Research School for Language Sciences (IMPRS) Conference 2022 June 01 - June 03 March 22 Online & Nijmegen, the Netherlands

Okay, these programs lean towards psychology, and auditory & language sciences. They do not cover many other domains within cognitive science. Let me know about other better-not-miss conferences, symposia and summer schools.

Talking about summer schools, the following summer schools/workshops/trainings have been quite useful:

  1. Summer School on Statistical Methods for Linguistics and Psychology (SMLP)
  2. Neuromatch academy (NMA)
  3. â€¦

Happy learning!
